name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Carlton LANE, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Carlton LANE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The judgments of sentence of the court of common pleas are affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: David N. Rosen, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Alan J. Sacks, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
452 A.2d 1011
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Carlton LANE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 22, 1982.
Decided Dec. 10, 1982.
David N. Rosen, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Alan J. Sacks, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
